attributes.action: Give us the Vote on who his succssor should be!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has done his best to make middle income families poorer and poorer in his years in Government.
As voters, we voted in Tony Blair and NOT Gordon Brown as PM. We should at the very least have a referendum on who should succeed Tony Blair as PM, and we should not have Gordon foisted on us without our having a say in the matter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
